This album deals exclusively with modern weapons. I have two separate albums for ancient weapons in the Military Museum. There are quite a few U.S. weapons on display here, so I'm listing this album under both "United States Museums" and "Chinese Museums." Photos by Gary L. Todd, Ph.D., Professor of History, Sias International University, Xinzheng, Henan, China. Â http://picasaweb.google.com/GaryLeeTodd/MilitaryMuseumModernWeaponsAircraftTanksEtc#
